source.c8daa78a:
*One trend that has been going on in the job market for nearly a decade is the widespread migration in search of better job opportunities. And this has been happening in both the blue-collar and white-collar workforce. Urban millennials, especially, are moving to cities such as Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru and Hyderabad, among others, for jobs. This brought about a massive demand for housing in these cities***

The latest to now join the race of long-term rental housing and shared housing is Ritesh Agarwal’s OYO. With its new business segment called OYO Life, the company is now betting big on this nascent market. With OYO Life, the company wants to offer long-term rental space with fully managed independent residential units, inclusive of contracting, furnishing, cleaning, maintenance, and in-stay services.

![](https://iide.co/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/OYO.jpg)



**OYO Life is targeting millennials and young professionals, who are looking for fully managed homes on long-term rentals, at affordable prices. OYO says that currently about 20% to 30% of the guests at OYO Life are students.
source.d8338f9f:
## Business Problem
As,this is the samll data of the Oyo rooms of 331 bookings done in  Delhi on the single day of 48 hours duration time (12 Dec 2016 to 13 Dec 2016).From ,the data we came to  know that the price of the different classes of rooms of Oyo depends upon the location in delhi mainly as well it is Monday . it mean the prices may also due to weekday effect 
### Aim
1 . **To predict , how much the Price flucation of the oyo rooms in delhi booked  with the standard margin of 25% discount of different hotel Standard Prices in a Single day  **
2 . **As, we can predict on average how much may price flucated in which Oyo location can help you a good eye in future for  hospitality Industry  to make a margin of profit as well prepared for Luxary and humble service to your beloved  customers 
#### Visualize 
* Count Plot to the Old pice and Price after the discount 
* Making a pie attempt to the Status of the Oyo rooms 
* Again Count Polt to the Fluctuation Price after the standard discount to the OYO rooms
